image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from New York; born in Charleston, Charleston County, S.C., September 16, 1959; B.S., United States Naval Academy, Annapolis, Md., 1981; United States Navy, 1981-2001; businessman; engineer; staff, United States House of Representatives Armed Services Committee; unsuccessful candidate for United States House of Representatives in 2006; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress until his resignation on March 8, 2010 (January 3, 2009-March 8, 2010).
